snippet: Jimmie Johnson overtook Brad Keselowski’s dominating Chase-contending car with three laps to go to win the AAA Texas 500 at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth.
abstract: Jimmie Johnson wins AAA Texas 500 auto race at Texas Motor Speedway; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson overtook Brad Keselowski’s dominating Chase-contending car with three laps to go to win the AAA Texas 500 at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth.
